cross: Cymbidium Eastern Bunny x Cymbidium erythraeum

measurements.description: Ten flowers on two 41-cm inflorescences; sepals green overlaid bronze; petals green overlaid bronze, intense burgundy marking proximal three-fourths, widest at base, narrowing along petal; lip white, short burgundy stripe center vein distally, additional burgundy marks each side of stripe; column green, anther cap white; substance medium-firm; texture matte.
